name: chickweed
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a low wild plant with small leaves and white flowers that is often considered as a weed, but is also used as food and in traditional medicine: We started pulling out the chickweed, which had taken over the garden and was crowding out our carrot crop. For lunch I had a salad with beets, chickweed, and mustard greens. Chickweeds have notched petals.
More examplesFewer examplesYou may think you have eradicated chickweed from your garden, but the seeds can lie dormant for a long time before they sprout again. The chickweed had migrated over the seasons and was now sprouting from between the cracks in the patio.
